title: A sincere apology and a Request..
body:
Listen.. Hear me out on this one ok

I'm sorry for the shit I said and Did in this game that got me a 14 week suspension.

I'm someone who gets way too riled up for his own good,

But PLEASE Re-evaluate this punishment, PLEASE Take a look at the chat log from this game that i know 100% is the reason i'm currently banned for 14 days

I've been trying extremely hard to keep myself under control for a long period of time in this game and it's been going well for months now

But the one time i finally let loose, The one time i slip up because of this yasuo in this game, I am HEAVILY punished for something that was provoked out of me by an extremely toxic individual trying to ruin the game for 4 people just trying to relax and play a god damn video game

This guy, This Yasuo, Afk farming and Intentionally sitting in spawn, Trying to ruin the game for 4 players in a NORMAL GAME not even ranked
Spamming toxic shit along the lines of 
"So Bad" (s b is an abbreviation used by chinese players to say -SO BAD-) 
"I Enjoy watching your Suffer" 
"Trash Dog"
"ww Ks all kills and think he's pro, Lmao"

While furiously spamming me with those damn Enemy missing ? pings ( Which can't be muted i add )

Sent me over the edge, I let loose on him, I apologize profusely for what I did, I know i should have muted him and reported him, But this guy managed to press the right buttons to send me over the edge both through his behavior and his actions that i just couldn't bring myself to ignore this guy

This guy literally Went all out to ruin the game for 4 players because " he didn't get a gank when he wanted one "

Can you honestly say i deserve what i got for 1 game of slipping up and letting loose on a player who's sole purpose was to ruin the game for 4 players on his team over such a Selfish reason?

I'm willing to admit what i did was wrong, i said some shit i regret.

I'm sorry but my Number one most hated thing isn't "Feeders" or "Intentional feeders" or "Shitty teammates"

It's players like this that spit in the face and try to ruin the game for four players  because they disagree with one player on their team,

then have the fucking audacity to say " I enjoy watching you suffer " at all four of them

I'm even willing to admit what i am a bit of a known Negative nancy amoung my teammates.

But i would sincerely appreciate if my report could be lowered to a 25 game chat restriction, a Shorted banned or removed all together.

if i absolutely have to wait the 14 days I will but at LEAST let me know this Toxic yasuo player will / did Receive the same tier of punishment as me for his actions and attitude that game.



There's the chat log from the game, 
I'm man enough to own up to the shit i said and post it for all to see as a reminder not be an asshole

I can give you a more thorough break-down if you want, but you do seem to realize what you typed was unacceptable. So let's move on to the other points.

>Can you honestly say i deserve what i got for 1 game of slipping up and letting loose on a player who's sole purpose was to ruin the game for 4 players on his team...

I can, yes. I understand frustration, and I understand anger. I even understand that people can lose control every now and then. Your chat log, however, is entirely full of insults, racism, and worse language. That's not a brief moment of control lost: that's a conscious decision to take your frustration out on another player (already inappropriate) in a racially-charged and completely offensive manner.

If his goal is to ruin your game, that's pretty awful, and you should definitely report him for it. But your actions did nothing but make the game even worse for the other players on your team: responding to toxicity with toxicity just creates MORE toxicity.

>But this guy managed to press the right buttons to send me over the edge both through his behavior and his actions that i just couldn't bring myself to ignore this guy

Unfortunately, that's not Riot's fault, and they don't owe you a do-over because you couldn't hold back.

>but at LEAST let me know this Toxic yasuo player will / did Receive the same tier of punishment as me for his actions and attitude that game.

Riot pretty much never gives players information about other player's accounts unless that player requests it. Chances are he may have been punished, although if he was simply idly farming and trash-talking with the sort of comment you posted it's unlikely he escalated to a 14-day ban unless he's been punished before: what you posted is definitely offensive, but it's not at the level of extended racism.

--------------------------------------

The big takeaway here is that Riot does NOT take the behaviors of other players into account, nor does it count "I was really TRYING not to be toxic" or "I couldn't control myself" as valid excuses. You are solely responsible for the content that you type into chat as it compares to community standards (not your previous behavior).

Fortunately for you, you avoided escalation to a permanent ban -- which is lucky, given that chat log. Just take this as a rather strict lesson on what is and isn't tolerated, and you'll be back to playing in two weeks. :)

I appreciate your sincerity. Over the next two weeks, you've got to take measures into account to reduce your reactions to toxic players. I want to point out that you did not mute in your game, as you described what that player said. Had you done this, I think you would have saved yourself a great deal of grief. You didn't even know the race of the Yas player until he told you. That's when your harassing chat reached hate speech / insta-ban level:

>WalfasWolfie: oh
WalfasWolfie: an asian
WalfasWolfie: %%%%%%%%%%%
.
.
WalfasWolfie: your country is the first getting bombed
.
WalfasWolfie: dog eating squinty eye'd fuck.

There's always a certain point when that toxic person has made it clear he's not going to be anything else but toxic in the game. Had you muted him, I don't think you'd be here. I'll also point out that calling for reports is harassment as well. If you feel this assessment is incorrect in anyway, you should submit a support [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Riot will also not tell you if that particular player will be punished.
